tool_description: Database of car makes and models
name: Car database
title: Car database

api_list.name: Makes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-database.p.rapidapi.com/makes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://car-database.p.rapidapi.com/makes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
